comment: The difference of two numbers to the same power is the difference of the two numbers multiplied with a finite sum. Generalization of ~ subsq . See Wikipedia "Fermat number", section "Other theorems about Fermat numbers", ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fermat_number , 5-Aug-2021. (Contributed by AV, 6-Aug-2021.)
